column.name: act_id
column.descr: Unique System ID for each action record

column.name: act_type_id
column.descr: What kind of action is this information stored for?

column.name: act_type
column.descr: The action type, if 'Other' chosen above

column.name: start_stamp
column.descr: The date that this action began

column.name: end_stamp
column.descr: The date that this action ends

table-type.name: Communication_Action
table-type.description: This table stores details of all communication actions between a patient and clinic

column.name: act_status
column.descr: The action status, if 'Other' chosen above

column.name: subject
column.descr: The reason why this action took place

column.name: initiator_id
column.descr: The person who initiated this action (i.e. who made the call, sent out the fax etc)

field.caption: Initiator Person ID
field.validate-msg:
Please ensure that this field contains a valid GUID32.
The format of a GUID32 is xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx where x is an uppercase letter or digit.

column.name: initiator
column.descr: The name of the initiator (if not specified above)

column.name: receptor_id
column.descr: The person who was at the receiving end of this action (i.e. who received the call or email etc)

field.caption: Receptor Person ID
field.validate-msg:
Please ensure that this field contains a valid GUID32.
The format of a GUID32 is xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx where x is an uppercase letter or digit.

column.name: receptor
column.descr: The name of the receptor (if not specified above)

column.name: rcpt_cont
column.descr: The e-mail address/phone/fax numbers used to contact the receptor. This is only needed if receptor_id is empty
